jd: From: Rahul Mishra, Vyzeinc rmishra@vyzeinc.com Reply to: rmishra@vyzeinc.com Sr. Data Engineer RemoteUSC/GCSkype JDthe top skills are Azure Data factory, Azure Databricks and Ci/CD.
